org.easybatch.core.jmx

Interface MonitorMBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Monitor

    public interface MonitorMBean
    JMX MBean interface to expose monitoring attributes.
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
